scripts.dev2: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npx nodemon index.js" "cd home-page-fe && npm start" "cd codenames-fe && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd codenames-fe && npm install && npm run build && cd ../did-you-know-fe && npm install && npm run build && cd ../home-page-fe && npm install && npm run build
